mapper.insert: insert into tb_advice (advice_id, advice_title, advice_body, advice_descript, create_time, update_time, user_id) values (#{adviceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{adviceTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adviceBody,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adviceDescript,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update tb_advice set advice_title = #{adviceTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, advice_body = #{adviceBody,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, advice_descript = #{adviceDescript,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where advice_id = #{adviceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select advice_id, advice_title, advice_body, advice_descript, create_time, update_time, user_id from tb_advice where advice_id = #{adviceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select advice_id, advice_title, advice_body, advice_descript, create_time, update_time, user_id from tb_advice
